name: Drink the Book: Moon River
description: The recipes in Cocktail Techniques are split into two sections—classics and originals. While comparing and contrasting the classic recipes with Uyeda's versions, using his techniques, is an enjoyable and enlightening experience, the book becomes especially compelling when it turns to his original creations.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well (using the hard shake) and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve.
